Description:
Detects usage of "cdb.exe" to launch arbitrary processes or commands from a debugger script file

Author: Beyu Denis, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Binary Proxy Execution Via Cdb.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\cdb.exe' and original_file_name = 'cdb.exe') and (command like '% -c %' or command like '% -cf %'))
